About page

Hello, fellow human! Welcome to my web sight. My name is Blake Bartenbach and this is my personal web sight. I am a Software Engineer by trade and my hobbies include running, eating pizza, and watching weird shows on Netflix with my girlfriend Mikayla and the cats (more on the cats later).

What the hell is this design?

Well, for starters, I must unfortunately admit I designed this look entirely myself. The design is a throwback to the VT100 terminal, although probably slightly more grotesque (if that's possible). It's a design only a mother could love (or a weird CS major, I guess).

Where's the cat information you promised me?

About that...Yeah, I lied. Mikayla's website is still in the works. I'll link it here when it goes live, though.
